ph.es:
Habiendo culminado la primer etapa de Argentina Programa, y recorriendo la segunda,
                                    continuo entrenando en Angular, Java y Typescript.
                                    He diseñado gráfica y estructuralmente mi portfolio, y posteriormente lo he
                                    desarrollado con Vanilla JavaScript. Actualmente lo estoy migrando a los stacks
                                    Angular + Java + Mongo / MySQL & M.E.A.N. y paulatinamente le iré incorporando otros
                                    proyectos que he desarrollado.
ph.en:
Having completed the first stage of Argentina Program, and surfing the second, I
                                    continue training in Angular, Java and Typescript.
                                    I have graphically and structurally designed my portfolio, and subsequently
                                    developed it with Vanilla JavaScript. I am currently migrating it to the Angular +
                                    Java + (Mongo / MySQL) & M.E.A.N stacks and gradually incorporating the other
                                    projects I have developed.

ph.es:
Me desempeñé como escribiente suplente. Si bien es un área en la que no tenía
                                    experiencia alguna, fue una excelente oportunidad para comprender lo que es trabajar
                                    en el sector público, dentro de un sistema completamente estructurado.
ph.en:
I served as an alternate clerk. While it's an area where I didn't have
                                    any experience, it was an excellent opportunity to understand what it is to work
                                    in the public sector, within a fully structured system.

ph.es:
Durante este período profundicé los contenidos aprendidos en el curso de WesBos y de
                                    la UTN, reescribiendo código con una mejor calidad, armando mis propias aplicaciones
                                    y librerías que me servirán a futuro en mi desempeño profesional.
ph.en:
During this period, I deepened the contents learned in the course of WesBos and the
                                    UTN, rewriting code with a better quality, writing my own applications and libraries
                                    for my professional work.

ph.es:
Destaco de esta experiencia el trabajo en un equipo multidisciplinario y la
                                    capacitación constante.
ph.en: I highlight from this experience the work in a multidisciplinary team and the constant training.

h2.es:
PAPPA CHARLY - Casa de Eventos - Autónomo
01/2016-12/2019
h2.en:
PAPPA CHARLY - Hall of Events - Independent
01/2016-12/2019

ph.es:
Co-Propietario de la empresa y encargado de la imagen institucional, sistemas de
                                    audio/video, ventas, facturación, caja. Destaco de esta experiencia lo que significa
                                    desenvolverse en un
                                    rol de jefe, coordinar las actividades de los eventos y ser responsable de la
                                    rentabilidad del negocio.
ph.en:
Co-owner of the company and in charge of the institutional image, audio/video
                                    systems, sales,
                                    invoicing and cashier. I highlight from this experience what it means to work in a
                                    co-boss role,
                                    coordinating all the
                                    activity, and what entails to be responsible for the profitability of the business.

ph.es:
Primeramente se nos capacitó en Fundamentos de la Programacion, Programacion
                                    Imperativa, POO. - (Finalizado)
                                    Posteriormente se capacita en la programación Full Stack centrada en las
                                    tecnologías: Boostrap, Angular, Typescript, Java y María DB. - (Cursando ~50%)
ph.en:
We were trained in Fundamentals of Programming, Programming
                                    Imperative, OOP. - (Approved)
                                    Subsequently, we are being trained in a Full Stack programming focused on these
                                    technologies: Boostrap, Angular, Typescript, Java and María DB. - (Done ~50%)

ph.es:
Cursando actualmente:
Angular de "Cero a Experto" de Fernando Herrera.
Typescript "The complete developer's guide" de Stephen Grider
Master completo en Java de Andrés José Guzmán.
ph.en:
Currently studying:
Angular "from Zero to Expert" by Fernando Herrera.
Typescript "The complete developer's guide" by Stephen Grider
Complete Master in Java by Andrés José Guzmán.

ph.es:
Este curso entrena sobre los aspectos más significativos de Javascript incluído ES6
                                    en adelante. Programación imperativa y POO. Aprendí a crear sliders, modals, tab
                                    panels, galleries; realizar fetch a diferentes Apis externas, y manejar algunas Apis
                                    muy
                                    interesantes del explorador como DOM, MediaDevices, AudioContext, Canvas,
                                    Intersection Observer,
                                    FaceDetector, entre
                                    otras. Si bien terminé el curso en Dic/2021, he reescrito el código original
                                    varias veces aplicando buenas prácticas y POO.
ph.en:
This course trains on the most significant aspects of Javascript including ES6
                                    and further. Imperative programming and OOP. I learned to create sliders, modals,
                                    tab
                                    panels, galleries; fetch to different externals Apis, and handle some very
                                    interesting Web Apis like DOM, MediaDevices, AudioContext, Canvas, Intersection
                                    Observer,
                                    FaceDetector, among
                                    other. Even though I finalized this course in 12/2021, I have re write this code
                                    many times, applying good practices and POO.

ph.es:
Desarrollo de sitios y aplicaciones web. HTML, SCSS, Js, Bootstrap, Principios de
                                    diseño responsive y accesibilidad; Angular, MaríaDB, NodeJs, Express.
ph.en:
Websites and web applications development. HTML, SCSS, Js, Bootstrap, Principles of
                                    responsive design and accessibility; Angular, MaríaDB, NodeJs, Express.

ph.es:
Destaco lo aprendido sobre Programación de Plcs, Electrotecnia, Mantenimiento
                                    Industrial, Tecnología de materiales, Informática, Inglés, Mecánica e Hidráulica,
                                    entre
                                    otras...
ph.en:
I remark what I learned about Plcs Programming, Electrotechnics, Industrial
                                    Maintenance
                                    , Materials Technology, Computer Science, English, Mechanics and Hydraulics,
                                    among
                                    others...

ph.es:
Un gran trayecto formativo en tasaciones y contratos. Si bien me gustó mucho la
                                    carrera, me reecontré con la programación y al día de hoy hacen 2 años que no dejo
                                    de programar ni un solo día.
ph.en:
A great training journey in appraisals and contracts. Although I really liked the
                                    career, I first met with the modern programming in January 2021 and from there I
                                    haven't stop developing for a single day.

ph.es:
Cursé 2 años de esta carrera adquiriendo conocimientos de Contabilidad,
                                    administración, tesorería, matemáticas. Abandoné este trayecto
                                    formativo, para poder emprender en un negocio del que fui co-titular por 4 años.
ph.en:
I studied this career for two years, acquiring knowledge about Accounting,
                                    Administration, Treasury and Mathematics. I left this learning path
                                    , to be able to start in a business for which I was co-owner for 4 years.

ph.es:
Aunque cursé solo el primer año, destaco de este trayecto un gran entrenamiento en
                                    algoritmos de programación y matemáticas, lo que claramente marcó mi inclinación por
                                    la programación.
ph.en:
Although I studied only the first year, I highlight from this journey a great
                                    training
                                    in
                                    programming algorithms and mathematics, which clearly marked my fans for
                                    programming.

I’m a FullStack
Developer Jr.
sections.es:
Hola! Soy Manuel
Soy desarrollador Full Stack!

slides.en:
I'm father, husband👪;
                fan
                of the biggest (River Plate) and a big fan of the technologies🤖 and 🕹️Video Games🕹️. I had the
                opportunity
                to
                study Programming at university some years ago, but it was in January 2021 that I first met with modern
                programming

Since that time I have been studying and developing some stuff in Js and friends.
Check it on GitHub here!🫡
This is an own project🧰, written from scratch in JavaScript and some Bootstrap+Icons. No Frameworks. No other third-party resources
All the technologies that were applied are listed in every page of the site. With this link you can check the Github repository😁. Enjoy it!

These are the technologies I use!
Languages - Databases:
JavaScript - Typescript - Sass - HTML - Angular - Node.js - Java - Git - SQL- MongoDB - MySQL
🎨Design Tools:
Figma - Pixlr - Clipchamp - Movavi - Obs - Audacity

📒Libraries:
Bootstrap - Date-fns - Lodash - Parcel - WebPack - Axios - Await-to-js - Mongoose - Bootswatch - ngx-bootstrap - nodemon - morgan -Cors - Express.

⚒️Others:
GitHub - SCRUM - Heroku - Googe Cloud - Vs Code - IntelliJ IDEA - Netlify - StackBlitz
